languages.text: "Подобная оценка жизни неуместна, груба... но не лишена истины. Герои моих любимых романов превозмогают тяготы — настал и мой черед".
"This outlook on life is unseemly and crude... but not without truth. The characters in my favourite novels have to overcome adversity — now it is my turn."
languages.original_text: "Подобная оценка жизни неуместна, груба... но не лишена истины. Герои моих любимых романов превозмогают тяготы — настал и мой черед".

traits.locale_text: "This outlook on life is unseemly and crude... but not without truth. The characters in my favourite novels have to overcome adversity — now it is my turn."
"This outlook on life is unseemly and crude... but not without truth. The characters in my favourite novels have to overcome adversity — now it is my turn."
"This outlook on life is unseemly and crude... but not without truth. The characters in my favourite novels have to overcome adversity — now it is my turn."
"This outlook on life is unseemly and crude... but not without truth. The characters in my favourite novels have to overcome adversity — now it is my turn."
"This outlook on life is unseemly and crude... but not without truth. The characters in my favourite novels have to overcome adversity — now it is my turn."

languages.text: "Diese Sicht auf das Leben ist unziemlich und krude ... aber nicht ohne Wahrheit. Die Figuren in meinen Lieblingsromanen müssen immer Widrigkeiten überwinden. Nun muss ich das tun."
languages.original_text: "This outlook on life is unseemly and crude... but not without truth. The characters in my favourite novels have to overcome adversity — now it is my turn."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Sicht auf das Leben ist unziemlich und krude ... aber nicht ohne Wahrheit. Die Figuren in meinen Lieblingsromanen müssen immer Widrigkeiten überwinden. Nun muss ich das tun."

languages.text: « Votre vision des choses est grossière et inconvenante... mais il y a du vrai, dans ce que vous dites. Les personnages de mes romans préférés sont toujours en butte à l'adversité, et à présent, c'est mon tour. »
languages.original_text: "This outlook on life is unseemly and crude... but not without truth. The characters in my favourite novels have to overcome adversity — now it is my turn."

traits.locale_text: « Votre vision des choses est grossière et inconvenante... mais il y a du vrai, dans ce que vous dites. Les personnages de mes romans préférés sont toujours en butte à l'adversité, et à présent, c'est mon tour. »

languages.text: «Esta perspectiva es impropia y rudimentaria... pero no está exenta de verdad. A los personajes de mis novelas favoritas les toca sufrir toda clase de penurias... y ahora me toca a mí».
languages.original_text: "This outlook on life is unseemly and crude... but not without truth. The characters in my favourite novels have to overcome adversity — now it is my turn."

traits.locale_text: «Esta perspectiva es impropia y rudimentaria... pero no está exenta de verdad. A los personajes de mis novelas favoritas les toca sufrir toda clase de penurias... y ahora me toca a mí».

languages.text: 「この人生観は見苦しく粗野です…でも、真実が含まれていないわけではありません。私の好きな小説の登場人物は逆境を乗り越えなければなりません。そして、今は私の番なのです」
languages.original_text: "This outlook on life is unseemly and crude... but not without truth. The characters in my favourite novels have to overcome adversity — now it is my turn."

traits.locale_text: 「この人生観は見苦しく粗野です…でも、真実が含まれていないわけではありません。私の好きな小説の登場人物は逆境を乗り越えなければなりません。そして、今は私の番なのです」

languages.text: “这样的人生观很粗糙，也很不得体……但并非全然没有道理。在我最喜欢的小说里，那些角色必须想办法克服逆境，而现在轮到我了。”
languages.original_text: "This outlook on life is unseemly and crude... but not without truth. The characters in my favourite novels have to overcome adversity — now it is my turn."

traits.locale_text: “这样的人生观很粗糙，也很不得体……但并非全然没有道理。在我最喜欢的小说里，那些角色必须想办法克服逆境，而现在轮到我了。”

languages.original_text: "This outlook on life is unseemly and crude... but not without truth. The characters in my favourite novels have to overcome adversity — now it is my turn."

languages.text: "Hayata karşı böylesi bir bakış açısı, yersiz ve ilkel... Ancak hakikatten çok da uzak değil. En sevdiğim romanlardaki karakterler, her daim zorlukların üstesinden gelir. Şimdi benim sıram."
languages.original_text: "This outlook on life is unseemly and crude... but not without truth. The characters in my favourite novels have to overcome adversity — now it is my turn."
